articles.description: Democratic lawmakers did not address Apple and Google's history of tracking COVID-19 positive users' movement without their permission.
articles.content: Senate Democrats Elizabeth Warren, Ron Wyden, and Cory Booker and Congresswoman Sara Jacobs are concerned that mobile tracking software created by Apple and Google could be used to "hunt down women" … [+2808 chars]

articles.author: Joseph Adinolfi
articles.title: 'Meme stock' trading frenzy review shows worrisome Robinhood liquidity issues - MarketWatch
articles.description: House panel’s findings suggest Robinhood’s decisions during market shakeup matched the broader industry’s moves, company statement argues
articles.content: The House Financial Services Committee on Friday issued a long-awaited report on the meme stock phenomena, shining new light on pressures faced by retail brokerages, including Robinhood Markets Inc.,… [+3520 chars]
